name: Intercept
description:
Intercept is a wacky multiplayer stealth-arena-battle game. Up to 4 players are lost in the crowd and none of you know where the other is; or yourself for that matter! Find yourself first and then try your best to find the other players without giving yourself away.

*Xbox or PS3 controllers required*

---------------------

Developed by AfterSix Games

Programming: Vignesh Ravi, Bill Feng

Art: Michael Crawford, Thao Pham, Mon Alexander Baybayon, Anth Rodi

Sound Design: Michael Crawford
